item.title: commitment and promise
item.description: TLDR A commitment holds more weight than a simple promise They do differ in how they frame the distinction: Emphasis on intent: Commitment signifies a genuine desire to fulfill the promise, suggesting sincerity and motivation. Focus on strength: Commitment implies a stronger promise than one can readily deliver highlighting its ambitious nature. Contrast with indulgence: Commitment stands against indulgence, emphasizing dedication and perseverance as key differentiators. In essence, commitments go beyond empty promises, demonstrating a willingness to put in the effort and potentially exceed expectations.
